text: dries van noten is a man who loves
flowers at least you would think so for
looking at his last collection wear
flowers in abundance were all over the
outfits running wild at cross pajamas
and across dresses the Council of
Fashion Designers of America the CFDA
are giving geese van noten an award as
best international designer that follows
on his stupendous dress that he produced
for Cate Blanchett for the Oscars when
she was eight months pregnant was it
difficult a little he says but that's
grease all over he's an antwerp designer
with that laid-back attitude which come
has formed that city and the people who
came from the Academy a lot of them
round about 20 years ago now they have
all matured but in the most delightful
way dries van noten is famous for being
a generous person for being very
interested in design in the larger sense
in his headquarters in Antwerp which is
by the old port it's the first concrete
building that was built in Europe and
it's pretty much of a bunker but it has
big spaces and against them you can see
the work that he and his team do masses
of colors lots of prints things mix
together wonderful fabrics it's all part
of the magic that dries van noten brings
to fashion this is Suzy Menkes for the
International Herald Tribune from
Antwerp in Belgium
